page.title: 20ASHLEY GREEN-RELIGION
page.content: Predominantly Church of England. The area falls within the diocese of Oxford and ther are two places of worship - the Church of St. John, Ashley Green and the church of St. Michael and All Angels, Whelpley Hill. Services are held weekly at Ashley Green but there are no services on the first Sunday of each month in Whelpley Hill. The one minister of religion in the area is resident in Ashley Green and is responsible for services at both the churches. There is some threat that upon the retirement of the present incumbent the parish will be amalgamated with one of the larger parishes in the nearby town of Chesham.
